question: [File: aptos-core/storage/db-tool/src/gen_replay_verify_jobs.rs] [Function: run()] [State Corruption] Does the mutable begin variable at line 95 that gets reassigned in the loop at line 123 cause incorrect range boundaries when multiple ranges are merged? (Medium)
